title: @Meddler, any context on why the Randuin's Omen PBE change was reverted a few patches ago?
body:
The active would give attack speed per enemy hit. This was reverted and no context was given afaik. 

Thanks

replies.body: Not certain myself off the top of the head. From memory that as a pretty experimental change, aimed at investigating what a more fighter focused Randuin's Omen would look like. I'd imagine the balance team decided it either wasn't delivering for fighters appropriately or that it should remain a good choice for tanks too.

Ah okay gotcha. Thanks for the info

What do you guys think of Fighters right now vs tanks? I mean in regards to what spot do you think fighters are in right now compared to tanks

Probably playtested and a Vayne/Kogmaw bought it and used it against a bruiser Diver and butchered them.

So they threw it into the "Nope" category.
